exercises.name: Treadmill
instruction: Step onto the treadmill and attach the safety clip.
Set the desired speed and incline.
Walk or jog with an upright posture, swinging your arms naturally.
Maintain steady breathing and avoid leaning on the handles.
exercises.description: Improves cardiovascular endurance, burns calories, and strengthens lower body muscles while enhancing stamina.

exercises.name: Arm circles back
instruction: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Extend arms straight out at shoulder height.
Rotate arms backward in small circles.
Gradually make the circles larger while maintaining control.
exercises.description: Enhances shoulder flexibility, warms up joints, and improves mobility.

exercises.name: Arm circles forward
instruction: Stand upright with feet shoulder-width apart.
Extend arms straight out at shoulder height.
Rotate arms forward in small circles.
Gradually increase the size of the circles.
exercises.description: Increases blood flow to the shoulders, improves joint mobility, and prepares the upper body for workouts.

exercises.name: Hanging side leg raise
instruction: Hang from a pull-up bar with arms fully extended.
Keep your core tight and legs straight.
Lift legs out to the side until they reach hip height.
Lower them back slowly without swinging.
exercises.description: Strengthens obliques, core stability, and improves grip strength.

exercises.name: Seated pec fly
instruction: Sit on the pec fly machine with your back against the pad.
Grasp the handles with elbows slightly bent.
Bring the handles together in front of your chest.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.description: Targets chest muscles, improves posture, and strengthens pushing movements.

exercises.name: Flat bench dumbbell chest press
instruction: Lie flat on a bench holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Position dumbbells at chest level with palms facing forward.
Press the dumbbells upward until arms are fully extended.
Lower slowly to the starting position.
exercises.description: Builds chest strength, improves arm power, and engages triceps.

exercises.name: Machine incline chest press
instruction: Sit on the incline press machine with back supported.
Grip the handles with palms facing forward.
Push the handles upward and forward until arms are extended.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.description: Focuses on the upper chest muscles for a fuller chest appearance.

exercises.name: Chest to floor push-ups
instruction: Start in a plank position with hands under shoulders.
Lower your body until your chest touches the floor.
Push back up to the starting position.
Keep core tight and body straight throughout.
exercises.description: Strengthens chest, shoulders, and triceps while improving core stability.

exercises.name: High-pulley curl
instruction: Stand facing the high pulley machine.
Hold the bar with an underhand grip.
Curl the bar toward your forehead while keeping elbows stationary.
Lower slowly to starting position.
exercises.description: Isolates biceps for muscle growth and definition.

exercises.name: Elliptical trainer
instruction: Step onto the pedals and hold the handles.
Begin pedaling in a forward motion.
Push and pull the handles for an upper-body workout.
Maintain a steady pace and posture.
exercises.description: Low-impact cardio that improves endurance and burns calories while engaging both upper and lower body.

exercises.name: Chest muscles stretch
instruction: Stand beside a wall or doorway.
Place your forearm against the surface with elbow at shoulder height.
Gently turn your body away to feel a stretch in the chest.
Hold for the prescribed time.
exercises.description: Improves chest flexibility, aids recovery, and helps maintain posture.

exercises.name: Hand and shoulder extensor stretch
instruction: Extend one arm straight in front of you, palm down.
Use the other hand to gently pull fingers back toward you.
Feel the stretch in your forearm and shoulder.
Hold for the prescribed time.
exercises.description: Enhances flexibility in forearms and shoulders, reducing injury risk.

exercises.name: Barbell curl
instruction: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell with an underhand grip.
Keep elbows tucked to your sides.
Curl the barbell upward toward your shoulders.
Lower slowly back to the starting position.
exercises.description: Classic biceps mass builder that develops arm strength and definition.

exercises.name: Overhead triceps extension
instruction: Hold a dumbbell with both hands and lift it overhead.
Keep elbows close to your ears.
Lower the dumbbell behind your head in a controlled motion.
Extend your arms back up to the starting position.
exercises.description: Strengthens the triceps and improves overhead pushing power.

exercises.name: Plank hold
instruction: Start in a forearm plank position with elbows under shoulders.
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Engage your core and avoid sagging hips.
Hold for the prescribed time.
exercises.description: Builds core stability, endurance, and improves posture.

exercises.name: Squats
instruction: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly pointed out.
Lower your body by bending at the hips and knees.
Keep your chest up and core engaged.
Descend until thighs are parallel to the floor, then return to standing.
exercises.description: Builds lower body strength, improves mobility, and burns calories.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar over mid-foot.
Bend at hips and knees to grip the bar with hands just outside legs.
Keep back straight and chest up.
Lift the bar by extending hips and knees, then lower with control.
exercises.description: Develops posterior chain strength, improves posture, and builds functional strength.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
instruction: Hang from a pull-up bar with hands slightly wider than shoulders.
Pull your body up until your chin clears the bar.
Lower yourself with control to full arm extension.
Keep core engaged throughout the movement.
exercises.description: Builds upper body pulling strength and improves grip strength.

exercises.name: Lunges
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Step forward with one leg, lowering hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.
Push back to starting position.
Alternate legs for each rep.
exercises.description: Improves balance, strengthens legs unilaterally, and enhances stability.

exercises.name: Bench Press
instruction: Lie on bench with feet flat on floor.
Grip bar with hands slightly wider than shoulders.
Lower bar to chest with control.
Press bar up until arms are fully extended.
exercises.description: Builds chest strength, improves pushing power, and develops triceps.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding barbell at shoulder level.
Press the bar straight up overhead.
Lower with control back to starting position.
Keep core tight throughout the movement.
exercises.description: Develops shoulder strength and stability, improves posture.

exercises.name: Rows
instruction: Bend at hips with knees slightly bent, holding barbell.
Pull bar toward lower chest/upper abdomen.
Squeeze shoulder blades together at the top.
Lower with control to starting position.
exercises.description: Strengthens back muscles, improves posture, and balances pushing movements.

exercises.name: Burpees
instruction: Start in standing position.
Drop into squat and place hands on floor.
Jump feet back into plank position.
Do a push-up, jump feet back to squat, then jump up with arms overhead.
exercises.description: Full-body exercise that improves cardiovascular fitness and builds strength.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
instruction: Start in plank position with hands under shoulders.
Bring one knee toward chest, then quickly switch legs.
Continue alternating legs at a fast pace.
Keep core tight and hips level.
exercises.description: High-intensity cardio exercise that improves endurance and core strength.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
instruction: Sit on floor with knees bent, feet lifted off ground.
Lean back slightly and rotate torso side to side.
Keep core engaged and maintain balance.
Touch ground on each side if possible.
exercises.description: Targets obliques and improves rotational core strength.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
instruction: Stand with feet together and arms at sides.
Jump up spreading feet shoulder-width apart while raising arms overhead.
Jump back to starting position.
Maintain steady rhythm and breathing.
exercises.description: Simple cardio exercise that improves coordination and cardiovascular fitness.

exercises.name: High Knees
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Run in place, bringing knees up toward chest.
Pump arms naturally as you run.
Maintain quick pace and light feet.
exercises.description: Dynamic warm-up exercise that improves coordination and cardiovascular fitness.

exercises.name: Leg Press
instruction: Sit on leg press machine with back against pad.
Place feet shoulder-width apart on platform.
Lower weight by bending knees to 90 degrees.
Press through heels to extend legs.
exercises.description: Builds lower body strength safely with machine support.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
instruction: Sit at lat pulldown machine with thighs secured.
Grip bar wider than shoulders with overhand grip.
Pull bar down to upper chest.
Control the weight back to starting position.
exercises.description: Develops latissimus dorsi and improves pulling strength.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Rise up onto balls of feet.
Lower with control back to starting position.
Keep core engaged and maintain balance.
exercises.description: Strengthens calf muscles and improves ankle stability.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
instruction: Bend at hips with one hand on bench, other holding dumbbell.
Pull dumbbell toward hip, keeping elbow close to body.
Squeeze shoulder blade at the top.
Lower with control to starting position.
exercises.description: Strengthens back muscles and improves posture.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding dumbbells at sides.
Raise arms out to sides until parallel to floor.
Keep slight bend in elbows throughout.
Lower with control to starting position.
exercises.description: Targets lateral deltoids for broader shoulders.

exercises.name: Leg Curls
instruction: Lie face down on leg curl machine.
Place ankles under the padded bar.
Curl heels toward glutes.
Lower with control to starting position.
exercises.description: Isolates hamstring muscles for strength and definition.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
instruction: Sit on leg extension machine with back against pad.
Place shins behind padded bar.
Extend legs until knees are straight.
Lower with control to starting position.
exercises.description: Isolates quadriceps for strength and definition.

exercises.name: Cable Flyes
instruction: Stand between cable machines with handles at chest level.
Bring handles together in front of chest.
Keep slight bend in elbows.
Return to starting position with control.
exercises.description: Targets chest muscles with constant tension.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
instruction: Set cable at face height.
Pull rope toward face, separating hands at face.
Focus on pulling with rear deltoids.
Return to starting position with control.
exercises.description: Strengthens rear deltoids and improves posture.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding dumbbells.
Keep palms facing each other throughout.
Curl weights up toward shoulders.
Lower with control to starting position.
exercises.description: Targets biceps and forearms with neutral grip.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
instruction: Sit on edge of bench with hands gripping edge.
Lower body by bending elbows.
Push back up to starting position.
Keep body close to bench throughout.
exercises.description: Strengthens triceps using bodyweight.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
instruction: Place rear foot on bench behind you.
Lower into lunge position.
Push through front heel to return to start.
Keep torso upright throughout.
exercises.description: Advanced unilateral leg exercise for strength and balance.

exercises.name: Hip Thrusts
instruction: Sit with upper back against bench, knees bent.
Place weight on hips.
Thrust hips up until body forms straight line.
Lower with control to starting position.
exercises.description: Targets glutes and hamstrings for posterior chain strength.
